GSD.description:
net: usb: ax88179_178a needs FLAG_SEND_ZLP

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.290 by commit 631b2b75867cb67a9e8dfa865f5b4e2037b6dd8b. For more details please see the references link.
